nodes.excerpt: SwiftCV helps you to build a beautifully designed page for your online professional presence. Make it easy for your visitors to find everything about you in one place. Use code PRODHUNT to get 20% off exclusively For suggestions reach us at hello@swiftcv.com

nodes.excerpt: This is a website with alcohol education and solutions, in partnership with over two dozen other independent brands who are working to raise the standards of the alcohol industry.
nodes.title: Know Your Alcohol  - Demystifying the alcohol industry (from Haus and Good Vodka)
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 这是一个提供酒精教育和解决方案的网站，与其他二十多个独立品牌合作，他们正在努力提高酒精行业的标准。
localize.tagline: 解读酒类行业（摘自豪斯和好伏特加）。

localize.tagline: 解讀酒類行業（摘自豪斯和好伏特加）。

nodes.excerpt: Plot combines your calendar, health and finances to give you a personalized overview of your life so you can manage what’s important. By integrating with your Apple Calendar and Health apps with your finances, Plot pulls-in and organizes your information.
nodes.title: Plot 2.0 - a calendar, health and personal finance app all in one
nodes.author: Cory McHattie

localize.description: Plot结合了你的日历、健康和财务，给你一个个性化的生活概览，让你可以管理重要的事情。通过整合你的Apple日历和健康应用程序与你的财务状况，Plot将你的信息拉进并组织起来。
localize.tagline: 一款集日历、健康和个人理财于一身的应用。

localize.description: Plot結合了你的日曆、健康和財務，給你一個個性化的生活概覽，讓你可以管理重要的事情。通過整合你的Apple日曆和健康應用程序與你的財務狀況，Plot將你的信息拉進並組織起來。
localize.tagline: 一款集日曆、健康和個人理財於一身的應用。

nodes.excerpt: SocialProofed is the easy way to embed Instagram feeds, Facebook reviews, and Google testimonials on your website...in just 60 seconds!
nodes.title: SocialProofed - Make commerce a social experience.
nodes.author: Mark

localize.description: SocialProofed是在您的网站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook评论和谷歌推荐的简单方法......只需60秒！您只需在您的网站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook评论和谷歌推荐。
localize.tagline: 让商业成为一种社交体验。

localize.description: SocialProofed是在您的網站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook評論和谷歌推薦的簡單方法......只需60秒！您只需在您的網站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook評論和谷歌推薦。
localize.tagline: 讓商業成爲一種社交體驗。

nodes.excerpt: ❤️ Open source 🤖 Native 🔌 Plugin system ⌨️ Custom hotkeys ⬆️ Sort options by frequency of use 📦 Small size (less than 20mb) Spotter is a productivity tool, the main function is to search and launch applications actions and applications themselves.
nodes.title: Spotter - Productivity tool that allows you to launch everything
nodes.author: Denis

localize.description: ❤️开源 🤖原生 🔌插件系统 ⌨️自定义热键 ⬆️按使用频率排序选项 📦体积小(小于20mb)Spotter是一个生产力工具，主要功能是搜索和启动应用的动作和应用本身。
localize.tagline: 生产力工具，允许你启动一切

localize.description: ❤️開源 🤖原生 🔌插件系統 ⌨️自定義熱鍵 ⬆️按使用頻率排序選項 📦體積小(小於20mb)Spotter是一個生產力工具，主要功能是搜索和啓動應用的動作和應用本身。
localize.tagline: 生產力工具，允許你啓動一切

nodes.excerpt: The Box Timer is a free and simple workout timer that works just like the timer at your local box. It is perfect for workouts at home, outside or at your box.
nodes.title: The Box Timer - A simple workout timer
nodes.author: Edvin Linden

localize.description: 盒子计时器是一个免费和简单的锻炼计时器，它的工作原理就像你当地盒子的计时器一样。它是完美的锻炼在家里，外面或在你的盒子。
localize.tagline: 一个简单的锻炼计时器

localize.description: 盒子計時器是一個免費和簡單的鍛鍊計時器，它的工作原理就像你當地盒子的計時器一樣。它是完美的鍛鍊在家裏，外面或在你的盒子。
localize.tagline: 一個簡單的鍛鍊計時器

nodes.excerpt: Figma Comments allows you to view and add new comments right from your phone. All you have to do is connect your Figma account and select the files you need. And as your teammates reply, you will see the new comments on the app, in real-time!
nodes.title: Figma Comments on Mobile - View and add comments on Figma using your mobile device.
nodes.author: Sahil Dave

localize.description: Figma Comments允许你在手机上直接查看和添加新的评论。您所要做的就是连接您的 Figma 帐户并选择您需要的文件。当你的队友回复时，你将会在应用程序上看到新的评论，而且是实时的。
localize.tagline: 使用您的移动设备在Figma上查看和添加评论。

localize.description: Figma Comments允許你在手機上直接查看和添加新的評論。您所要做的就是連接您的 Figma 帳戶並選擇您需要的文件。當你的隊友回覆時，你將會在應用程序上看到新的評論，而且是實時的。
localize.tagline: 使用您的移動設備在Figma上查看和添加評論。

nodes.excerpt: 🚀 Codekeep lets you store and share bits of code and text with other users. Snippets can be organized into folders/labels for instant reuse. Create code screenshots and link it with codekeep.
nodes.title: CodeKeep - Organize, discover & share code snippets
nodes.author: JP1016

localize.description: 🚀 Codekeep 可以让你存储并与其他用户分享代码和文本片段。可以将代码片段组织到文件夹/标签中，以便即时重复使用。创建代码截图，并与codekeep链接。
localize.tagline: 组织、发现和共享代码片段

localize.description: 🚀 Codekeep 可以讓你存儲並與其他用戶分享代碼和文本片段。可以將代碼片段組織到文件夾/標籤中，以便即時重複使用。創建代碼截圖，並與codekeep鏈接。
localize.tagline: 組織、發現和共享代碼片段

nodes.excerpt: 🤔 Are you tired of constantly switching between your work apps on your browser/desktop? 😎 Hubblu is a distraction-free workspace having all your work apps in 1-place 🤑 Increase your productivity and save up to 40% more time cutting down on distractions
nodes.title: Hubblu - Distraction Free Workspace | All your Work Apps in 1-Place
nodes.author: Saimohit Sai

localize.description: 🤔 您是否厌倦了在浏览器/桌面上不断切换工作应用程序？😎 Hubblu是一个无干扰的工作空间，将您所有的工作应用程序集中在一个地方 🤑 提高您的生产力，并节省多达40％以上的时间，减少分心。
localize.tagline: 无干扰的工作空间｜所有的工作应用都在一个地方。

localize.description: 🤔 您是否厭倦了在瀏覽器/桌面上不斷切換工作應用程序？😎 Hubblu是一個無干擾的工作空間，將您所有的工作應用程序集中在一個地方 🤑 提高您的生產力，並節省多達40％以上的時間，減少分心。
localize.tagline: 無干擾的工作空間｜所有的工作應用都在一個地方。

nodes.excerpt: Bring your drawings to life and create your own flipbook animations with FlipKit! Whether you are a beginner or a professional, FlipKit provides you all the tools needed to start animating. Be inspired by one our fun examples.
nodes.title: FlipKit - Create your own flipbook animations
nodes.author: Matthias Buchetics

localize.description: 让你的图画活起来，用FlipKit创建你自己的翻书动画! 无论你是初学者还是专业人士，FlipKit都能为你提供所有需要的工具来开始制作动画。从我们有趣的例子中获得灵感。
localize.tagline: 创建你自己的flipbook动画

localize.description: 讓你的圖畫活起來，用FlipKit創建你自己的翻書動畫! 無論你是初學者還是專業人士，FlipKit都能爲你提供所有需要的工具來開始製作動畫。從我們有趣的例子中獲得靈感。

nodes.excerpt: The Koji Meme Generator revolutionizes the way we make memes. Amazing creative controls, analytics, and NEW meme attribution are all built-in. Create a meme template for others to remix... and get credited for your meme creations.
nodes.title: Meme Template Generator by Koji - Create new meme templates in seconds
nodes.author: Luis Chavez

localize.description: Koji Meme Generator 彻底改变了我们制作 meme 的方式。惊人的创意控制、分析和新的备忘录归属都是内置的。创建一个meme模板，让其他人进行混音......并为您的meme创作获得荣誉。
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内创建新的备忘录模板

localize.description: Koji Meme Generator 徹底改變了我們製作 meme 的方式。驚人的創意控制、分析和新的備忘錄歸屬都是內置的。創建一個meme模板，讓其他人進行混音......併爲您的meme創作獲得榮譽。
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內創建新的備忘錄模板

nodes.excerpt: Smooth Hand Mockup helps you showcase your apps and services properly with animated hand mockups. It is designed to make your videos self-explanatory and engaging.
nodes.title: Smooth Hand Mockups - Create animated hand mockups and gestures for all devices

localize.description: Smooth Hand Mockup可以帮助您通过动画手部模拟来正确展示您的应用程序和服务。它的设计是为了让你的视频自明和吸引人。

nodes.excerpt: Glyphs 3 is a Mac font editor that puts you in control: quickly draw high-precision vectors, efficiently reuse shapes, and easily manage any number of letters, figures and symbols.
nodes.title: Glyphs 3.0 - Build, edit and manage fonts on your Mac
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Glyphs 3是一款Mac字体编辑器，让你掌控一切：快速绘制高精度矢量，高效重用形状，轻松管理任意数量的字母、数字和符号。
localize.tagline: 在 Mac 上建立、编辑和管理字体。

localize.description: Glyphs 3是一款Mac字體編輯器，讓你掌控一切：快速繪製高精度矢量，高效重用形狀，輕鬆管理任意數量的字母、數字和符號。
localize.tagline: 在 Mac 上建立、編輯和管理字體。

nodes.excerpt: Block Party builds tools against online abuse. Our mission is to create a safer online experience by building solutions for user control, protection and safety. Use Block Party to filter out unwanted @mentions from Twitter and take control of your online experience.
nodes.title: Block Party - Bye-bye, Twitter trolls 👋
nodes.author: Tracy Chou

localize.description: Block Party打造的工具可以防止网络滥用。我们的使命是通过构建用户控制、保护和安全的解决方案来创造更安全的在线体验。使用Block Party过滤掉Twitter上不需要的@mentions，并控制您的在线体验。
localize.tagline: 再见，推特巨魔 👋。

localize.description: Block Party打造的工具可以防止網絡濫用。我們的使命是通過構建用戶控制、保護和安全的解決方案來創造更安全的在線體驗。使用Block Party過濾掉Twitter上不需要的@mentions，並控制您的在線體驗。
localize.tagline: 再見，推特巨魔 👋。

nodes.excerpt: Drata saves companies hundreds of hours per year getting and staying SOC 2 compliant by continuously monitoring their security posture and automatically collecting evidence of their controls across AWS, GCP, GitHub, Jira, Gusto, G Suite, Office365 and more.
nodes.title: Drata - Put SOC 2 Compliance on Autopilot
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: Drata通过持续监控其安全态势并自动收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制证据，每年可为公司节省数百小时的时间，以获得并保持SOC 2合规性。
localize.tagline: 将SOC 2合规性置于自动驾驶状态

localize.description: Drata通過持續監控其安全態勢並自動收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制證據，每年可爲公司節省數百小時的時間，以獲得並保持SOC 2合規性。
localize.tagline: 將SOC 2合規性置於自動駕駛狀態

nodes.excerpt: The real metal finish on the main camera adds unity to the design and accentuates the luxury of the haze texture. It’s an iconic new camera design made to turn heads.

nodes.excerpt: The only eCommerce single-click ad spend optimizer. We here at Optily want to help you make the most of the advertising budget you have to work with. Our fees are flat, not based on what you spend, so we’re in it to help you win.

nodes.excerpt: Sprouter’s mission is to connect people and share life’s best moments faster than ever before while not only enhancing your overall social media experience, but the ecosystem of social media itself.

localize.description: Sprouter的使命是比以往任何时候都更快地连接人们并分享生活中最美好的时刻，同时不仅提升你的整体社交媒体体验，而且提升社交媒体本身的生态系统。

nodes.excerpt: A platform to streamline clinical operations for behavioral health clinics -- including scheduling, patient management, session notes, and more -- so clinics can get back to what really matters: treating their patients. Launching in the autism space.
nodes.title: Juniper - Practice management platform for behavioral health
nodes.author: Lindsay Amos

localize.description: 一个为行为健康诊所简化临床操作的平台--包括日程安排、患者管理、疗程记录等--因此诊所可以回到真正重要的事情上：治疗他们的患者。在自闭症领域推出。
localize.tagline: 行为健康实践管理平台

localize.description: 一個爲行爲健康診所簡化臨牀操作的平臺--包括日程安排、患者管理、療程記錄等--因此診所可以回到真正重要的事情上：治療他們的患者。在自閉症領域推出。

nodes.excerpt: Your digital assets which are exposed to the internet create threats. SwordEye Attack surface mapping constantly monitors your exposed digital assets, external threats and determines your risk score with zero-setup.
nodes.title: Know Your Attack Surface - Your digital assets exposed to the internet create threats.
nodes.author: Seyfullah KILIÇ

localize.description: 您暴露在互联网上的数字资产会产生威胁。SwordEye攻击面图谱持续监控您暴露的数字资产、外部威胁，并以零设置确定您的风险分数。
localize.tagline: 您暴露在互联网上的数字资产会产生威胁。

localize.description: 您暴露在互聯網上的數字資產會產生威脅。SwordEye攻擊面圖譜持續監控您暴露的數字資產、外部威脅，並以零設置確定您的風險分數。
localize.tagline: 您暴露在互聯網上的數字資產會產生威脅。

nodes.excerpt: File sharing done simple. Accountless file sharing with no limits. Share files easily for free on Starfiles.

localize.description: 文件共享做得很简单。无帐号文件共享，无限制。在Starfiles上免费轻松分享文件。

nodes.excerpt: qr.eletto.dev is a simple QR code generator for developers. It can be used in any project to quickly generate QR codes. Instead of installing libraries into your project to generate QR codes, you can just use the URL as an image.
nodes.title: QR Code Generator For Developers - A quick API to generate QR codes in your apps
nodes.author: JohnAnthony Eletto

localize.description: qr.eletto.dev是一个简单的二维码生成器，适用于开发者。它可以用于任何项目中快速生成二维码。不需要在你的项目中安装库来生成二维码，你只需要使用URL作为图像即可。
localize.tagline: 在您的应用程序中生成QR码的快速API。

localize.description: qr.eletto.dev是一個簡單的二維碼生成器，適用於開發者。它可以用於任何項目中快速生成二維碼。不需要在你的項目中安裝庫來生成二維碼，你只需要使用URL作爲圖像即可。
localize.tagline: 在您的應用程序中生成QR碼的快速API。

nodes.excerpt: The Chief of Staff Network is a private community connecting Chiefs of Staff from the fastest growing startups and enterprises. Our community meets in a trusted environment to learn from one another, exchange ideas and reach their full potential as leaders.
nodes.title: Chief of Staff Network - Community for Chiefs of Staff to accelerate their careers.
nodes.author: Scott Amenta

localize.description: 办公室主任网络是一个连接来自发展最快的初创企业和企业的办公室主任的私人社区。我们的社区在一个值得信赖的环境中聚会，相互学习，交流思想，充分发挥他们作为领导者的潜力。
localize.tagline: 为参谋长加快事业发展的社区。

localize.description: 辦公室主任網絡是一個連接來自發展最快的初創企業和企業的辦公室主任的私人社區。我們的社區在一個值得信賴的環境中聚會，相互學習，交流思想，充分發揮他們作爲領導者的潛力。
localize.tagline: 爲參謀長加快事業發展的社區。

nodes.excerpt: Don't know which Indie Makers to follow on Twitter? IndieLeaders helps you discover the Indie Makers who are on top of their indie game.
nodes.title: IndieLeaders - Discover Indie Makers who are on top of their indie game.
nodes.author: Adriaan

localize.description: 不知道该在Twitter上关注哪些独立制作人？IndieLeaders帮助你发现那些在独立游戏中处于领先地位的独立制作人。
localize.tagline: 发现那些在独立游戏中处于领先地位的独立制作人。

localize.description: 不知道該在Twitter上關注哪些獨立製作人？IndieLeaders幫助你發現那些在獨立遊戲中處於領先地位的獨立製作人。
localize.tagline: 發現那些在獨立遊戲中處於領先地位的獨立製作人。
